text: aur vahee hai jo apanee dayaaluta se pahale shubh soochana dene ko havaen bhejata hai, yahaan tak ki jab ve bojhal baadal ko utha letee hai to ham use kisee nirjeev bhoomi kee or chala dete hai, phir usase paanee barasaate hai, phir usase har tarah ke phal nikaalate hai. isee prakaar ham murdon ko mrt avastha se nikaalege - taaki tumhen dhyaan ho
